DOC.brief_summary: Acute supplementation Sustamine ( TM ) , combination two amino acid , improve cycle performance mental acuity dose-dependent response .

DOC.criteria: Competitive cyclist triathlete Male ( VO2max > = 55 ml/kg/min ) Female ( VO2max > = 45 ml/kg/min ) Healthy Blood pressure 140/90 Nonsmoker Antidepressant medication Inconsistent regular medication Consumption performanceenhancing substance Type I Type II diabetes Renal , hepatic cardiac disease Current infectious disease
